RadialGradient

gradient. RadialGradient

new RadialGradient

Constructs a RadialGradient instance

Parameters:
Name Type Description
stops Array

Color stops in the form: ['red','yellow',...] or [['red', 0], ['green', 50], ['#FFF', 100]] i.e. Sub-array [0] is color and [1] is percentage
radius number

Radius in percentage
matrix Matrix

Matrix transform for gradient
units String

Either 'userSpace' or 'boundingBox'.
fx Number

Focal x coordinate
fy Number

Focal y coordinate

Methods

clone

Clones the instance, returning a new one

Returns:

The clone

Type
RadialGradient
